newsitem.title: USA: Scanvec names Rothman as new president.
newsitem.headline: Scanvec names Rothman as new president.

text.p: ScanVec Co said on Wednesday that it had appointed Shmuel Rothman as president and chief executive officer, effective immediately.
In a statement, ScanVec said Rothman will be responsible for the company's worldwide operations, which includes ScanVec Inc, the company's U.S. subsidiary.
Rothman previously served in senior management positions at ELTA, Electronic Industries Inc, a subsidiary of Israel Aircraft Industries, ScanVec said.
Ramon Harel, who held the position of chairman and chief executive before Rothman's placement, will now assume full time responsibilities as chairman of the board, the company said.
ScanVec Co designs software for the graphic arts, textile and machining industries.
